item.title: Boz - BBB
item.description: It"s the Taint of the Weeku2122 again, so it"s time for Boz to speak utter bollocks in between your requests. All aboard the Train-Wreck, WOO WOOH!

item.title: KraxxUltima - The Crack ReOpens
item.description: He"s back for another round of nonsen...Errr No, of course not that, but Commodore related tune and remixes :)After about a year"s silence Kraxx is finally back on air to satisfy listeners of C64 and Amiga music, mixed with the usual amount of talk and other effects in between.Seeya on the show Slayers! :D

item.title: Gurt - Radio Awesome
item.description: We"re back again for another week! Endure hours of music and prattling Antipodeans, and the only reward you get is bragging rights! It"s the usual mumbo jumbo. It"s cool, though.
